title: How to Send CSGO Skins on Steam on PC or Mac

steps.headline: Open Steam.
steps.description: You’ll usually find this in your Start menu or in the Applications folder. Different items on Steam become tradable at different times. Some can be traded immediately, others may require you to wait weeks or months. For more information, read the Steam trading  and market restrictions.

steps.headline: Click the View tab.
steps.description: You’ll see this in the upper-left corner of the window.

steps.headline: Click Inventory.
steps.description: This displays the contents of your inventory.

steps.headline: Click the friend you want to send the skin to.
Select the skin and click Make Offer.
steps.description: Your friend can choose to accept or deny the trade.

text: Open Steam. You’ll usually find this in your Start menu or in the Applications folder. Different items on Steam become tradable at different times. Some can be traded immediately, others may require you to wait weeks or months. For more information, read the Steam trading  and market restrictions. Click the View tab. You’ll see this in the upper-left corner of the window. Click Inventory. This displays the contents of your inventory. Click Trade Offers. It's above the inventory. Click New Trade Offer. Your "Friends" list will load. Click the friend you want to send the skin to. A trading window will load. Select the skin and click Make Offer. Your friend can choose to accept or deny the trade.
